channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国监管机构加倍承诺关注习近平的反腐运动
item.description: China's anti-graft watchdog doubled down on a pledge to relentlessly carry out President Xi Jinping's orders to catch corrupt and disloyal officials, state media said on Wednesday.翻译:官方媒体周三称，中国反腐监管机构加倍努力，承诺坚决执行习近平主席的命令，抓捕腐败和不忠的官员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Grifols 向 Gotham 寻求至少相当于股份损失的赔偿——董事会成员
item.description: Spain's pharmaceutical company Grifols will seek a compensation at least equivalent to the share price loss prompted by short seller Gotham City Research's Tuesday report in the lawsuit it plans to launch, a board member told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:西班牙制药公司 Grifols 的一名董事会成员周三告诉路透社，该公司将在其计划发起的诉讼中寻求至少相当于卖空者 Gotham City Research 周二报告所造成的股价损失的赔偿。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国将部署军舰、航母进行印度洋联合训练
item.description: Britain said on Wednesday it would send warships to the Indian Ocean later this year and an aircraft carrier to the region in 2025 for joint training and operations with Indian forces as the two countries strengthen their security ties.翻译:英国周三表示，随着两国加强安全关系，英国将在今年晚些时候向印度洋派遣军舰，并于 2025 年向该地区派遣一艘航空母舰，与印度军队进行联合训练和行动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Transneft：2023 年俄罗斯通过其网络的石油出口量下降 6.5%
item.description: Russian state-controlled oil pipeline monopoly Transneft said on Wednesday that Russian crude exports via its pipelines were down 6.5% last year, while total oil deliveries through its network in 2023 had remained flat from 2022.翻译:俄罗斯国家控制的石油管道垄断企业Transneft周三表示，去年俄罗斯通过其管道的原油出口量下降了6.5%，而2023年通过其网络的石油输送总量与2022年持平。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：华尔街关注消费者物价指数和比特币波动，日本大放异彩
item.description: A look at the day ahead in US and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 芬兰表示，芬兰和中国国家主席讨论了管道损坏问题
item.description: Finland's President Sauli Niinisto said on Wednesday he had held constructive talks with China's President Xi Jinping over the damage inflicted last year to the Balticconnector gas pipeline linking Finland and Estonia.翻译:芬兰总统绍利·尼尼斯托周三表示，他与中国国家主席习近平就去年连接芬兰和爱沙尼亚的波罗的海天然气管道遭受的损害进行了建设性会谈。
item.author: Anne Kauranen, Liz Lee

item.title: 行业协会：大众、丰田2023年中国市场份额萎缩
item.description: Volkswagen Group and Toyota Motor saw their share of the world's largest auto market shrink last year, industry data showed on Wednesday, as legacy international automakers ceded ground to Chinese rivals.翻译:周三的行业数据显示，随着传统国际汽车制造商将市场份额拱手让给中国竞争对手，大众集团和丰田汽车去年在全球最大汽车市场的份额出现萎缩。
item.author: Qiaoyi Li, Brenda Goh

item.title: 2024 年达沃斯：极端天气和错误信息是全球最大风险
item.description: Risk specialists see extreme weather and misinformation as most likely to trigger a global crisis in the next couple of years, a World Economic Forum (WEF) survey released on Wednesday said.翻译:世界经济论坛（WEF）周三发布的一项调查显示，风险专家认为极端天气和错误信息最有可能在未来几年引发全球危机。
item.author: Victoria Waldersee

item.title: 印度莫迪在商业峰会上吸引投资者，企业公布巨额支出计划
item.description: India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi touted his country's economic prospects at a major business summit in his home state on Wednesday as companies Maruti Suzuki and Adani unveiled investment plans worth nearly $30 billion combined.翻译:印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪周三在其家乡举行的一次大型商业峰会上宣扬了印度的经济前景，马鲁蒂铃木公司和阿达尼公司公布了总价值近 300 亿美元的投资计划。
item.author: Sumit Khanna, Aditi Shah

item.title: 充满选举的 2024 年将如何影响世界市场
item.description: Markets face a "ballot box bombshell."翻译:市场面临“投票箱重磅炸弹”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国的政策困境：信贷提振是否会导致通货紧缩？
item.description: China's central bank faces a major hurdle in quelling the threat of deflation: more credit is flowing to productive forces than into consumption, exposing structural flaws in the economy and reducing the effectiveness of its monetary policy tools.翻译:中国央行在消除通货紧缩威胁方面面临着一个重大障碍：更多的信贷流向生产力而非消费，暴露了经济的结构性缺陷并降低了货币政策工具的有效性。
item.author: Kevin Yao

item.title: 红海袭击：零售商急于避免春季系列产品延误
item.description: Retailers worldwide are stocking up on goods before China's Lunar New Year holiday and seeking air or rail alternatives to transportation via the Red Sea in a scramble to avoid empty shelves this spring, executives and experts told Reuters.翻译:高管和专家告诉路透社，世界各地的零售商都在中国农历新年假期前备货，并寻求通过红海运输的航空或铁路替代方案，以避免今年春天货架空空。
item.author: Siddharth Cavale, Helen Reid

item.title: 习近平向艾奥瓦州老朋友表示世界需要中美关系稳定
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping, in a recent reply to a letter from an Iowa native whom he first met nearly four decades ago, said the world's future demanded stability in Sino-U.S. ties, according to Chinese state media on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，中国国家主席习近平最近在回信一位爱荷华州人的来信中表示，世界的未来需要中美关系的稳定。他与爱荷华州人在近四十年前首次会面。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 民意调查 随着全球贸易回暖，中国12月出口有所改善
item.description: China's exports likely grew more quickly and for a second month in December, a Reuters poll showed, adding to signs global trade is starting to recover thanks to an upturn in the electronics industry and expectations of lower borrowing costs in 2024.翻译:路透调查显示，中国出口可能在 12 月份连续第二个月增长更快，这进一步表明，由于电子行业的好转以及 2024 年借贷成本下降的预期，全球贸易开始复苏。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 菲律宾、印度尼西亚领导人就南海和东盟集团举行会谈
item.description: The leaders of the Philippines and Indonesia met in Manila on Wednesday to discuss developments in the South China Sea and efforts to build closer ties among Southeast Asian nations, among a range of issues.翻译:菲律宾和印度尼西亚领导人周三在马尼拉会面，讨论南海的事态发展以及东南亚国家之间建立更紧密关系的努力等一系列问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾选举前台湾与中国关系的关键事实
item.description: Taiwan goes to the polls on Saturday to elect a new president and parliament. China, which considers Taiwan merely a Chinese province and part of its territory despite the objections of the island's government, will be watching the outcome closely.翻译:台湾周六将举行投票选举新总统和国会。尽管台湾政府反对，中国仍将台湾视为中国的一个省及其领土的一部分，因此将密切关注这一结果。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾将在中国所谓的“和平与战争”选举中投票
item.description: Taiwan goes to the polls on Saturday to elect a new president and parliament under the shadow of an increasingly assertive China which has called the vote a choice between peace and war.翻译:在日益自信的中国的阴影下，台湾周六将举行投票选举新总统和议会，中国称这次投票是和平与战争之间的选择。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard

item.title: 美中在华盛顿结束为期两天的军事会谈
item.description: The United States and China wrapped up two days of military talks in Washington on Tuesday, the Pentagon said, the latest engagement since the two countries agreed to resume military-to-military ties.翻译:五角大楼表示，美国和中国周二在华盛顿结束了为期两天的军事会谈，这是两国同意恢复军事关系以来的最新接触。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国卫星发射引发台湾大选前政治风暴
item.description: The launch of a Chinese satellite that flew over Taiwan, prompting an erroneous air raid alert, sparked a political storm on the island on Wednesday about China's motives only days out from presidential elections.翻译:周三，中国发射的一颗卫星飞越台湾，引发了错误的空袭警报，在台湾引发了一场关于中国动机的政治风暴，距离总统选举只有几天了。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu

item.title: 哥谭市报告后，格里福斯将于周二下午召开董事会会议
item.description: Spanish pharmaceutical company Grifols is set to hold a board meeting on Tuesday afternoon in reaction to a report from Gotham City Research questioning the company's accounting released earlier, board member Tomas Daga told Reuters.翻译:西班牙制药公司 Grifols 董事会成员托马斯·达加 (Tomas Daga) 告诉路透社，该公司定于周二下午召开董事会会议，以回应 Gotham City Research 质疑该公司早些时候发布的会计报告的报告。
item.author: Reuters
